contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 24, 1903 D Tredegar Contest (Class A)
Tredegar Contest (Class A) 0 Test Piece Contest
tredegar-contest-class-a
None
Le Domino Noir [unknown arranger]
Bedwellty Park, Tredegar, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £18.18s., 2nd £7.7s., 3rd £3.3s. Best cornet - Tillery Colliery. Best euphonium - Aberaman. Promoted to raise funds for Park Cottage Hospital. 3 bands competed.
June 20, 2013, 6:28 a.m. Aug. 9, 2016, 8:13 a.m.
1 Tillery Collieries Band John Griffiths
2 Ferndale Samuel Radcliffe
3 Aberaman Henry Bentley
